{"id":475884256,"lang":"java","time":"6 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1617453953,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"13 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/475884256/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Make The String Great","memory":"40.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    int remove=0;\n    ArrayList<Character> cur_result=new ArrayList<Character>();\n    public String makeGood(String s) {\n        for (char c : s.toCharArray()) {\n          cur_result.add(c);\n        }\n        do{\n            remove=0;\n            for(int i=0;i<cur_result.size();i++){\n                if(i>=1&&(cur_result.get(i)==cur_result.get(i-1)-32||cur_result.get(i)==cur_result.get(i-1)+32)){\n                    cur_result.remove(i);\n                    cur_result.remove(i-1);\n                    remove++;\n                }\n            }\n        }while(remove!=0);\n        String final_result=cur_result.toString().replaceAll(\"[,\\\\s\\\\[\\\\]]\", \"\");\n        return final_result;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"make-the-string-great"}
